titles.title: To require mercenary training to be conducted only on Federal Government property.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E1974)
Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Military Personnel.

bill.summary:
9/25/2007--Introduced.
Requires that mercenary training (as defined by this Act) be conducted only on federal Government property.
